title: As a Club AMT User, I want to view all my prospects for the current period
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in 
AND user is viewing the Prospects Page 
AND the Prospects page will have a "Prospects" filter 
AND the filter will also display the total number of players matching that filter, i.e. "Overdue(15)"
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the filter link
custom_expected:
THEN the system will reload the table to display all "Draft" players and all players the Club has checked-in during the current 6 month period
  --  The 6 month periods are defined as:
     - January 1 - July 1
     - July 2 - December 31
AND If the club has no "Draft" players and has not checking in any players for the current period, the table will be blank
AND If a player is checked in when the period rolls over, he will be considered Checked In in the new period
  --  *Example*: A player is checked in on June 30th.  He is still checked in when the period roles over on July 2nd.  He will continue to be considered checked in and will automatically appear under Prospects

title: As a AMT User, I want AMT to feature the same matching logic that ebis uses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user logged in 
AND user is creating a new player profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Next" in create player page
custom_expected:
THEN the system will run a duplicate check according to the provided rules. 
AND Club users will only see a match per stories if they have permission to view the matching profile as a match. 
AND Club users are able to see a profile as a match under the following conditions: 
  - The player has been selected for L2 Registration by the BOC.
  - The player has been entered by the viewing Org.
  - The player has been added to the viewing Org's Club Reg List. 
  - The player has passed their Eligible to Sign Date. 
   - The player has been explicitly been made public by the BOC by a flag on their profile. 
  - If none of the above conditions have been met - then the player may appear as a match only under the following conditions: 
        - The player has been registered and their First Review has been set to "Verified" or "Pre-Verified". 
        - The player is Unregistered and does not have a Scouting Status of "International Suspect". 

Business Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4+of+7+Check

Visibility Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/International+Amateur+-+Profile+Visibility

title: As an AMT Club User, I want to save a new travel authorization form
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club

Wire:
Form: https://zpl.io/adPMAEK
Club Widget: https://zpl.io/2pldoL8

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Authorization+Form
custom_steps: WHEN viewing a Travel Authorization
custom_expected:
THEN a "Save" button will be available anytime the form is in edit mode. 
AND clicking Save will run a required field and formatting check.

AND saving a new Form, prior to submitting it, will give the Form a status of "Preliminary"

AND the button will appear on unsaved or preliminary Travel Forms
AND clicking Submit will run a required field and formatting check per the data discovery 
AND once the form has passed the required field and formatting checks, if the form was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode
AND the Form's status will update to Submitted, which will also be reflected on the Club's Travel Forms widget
AND The Form will now appear on the BOC's Travel Forms widget, show the status of submitted
AND the green success notification will be displayed

title: As an AMT Club User, I want to delete a travel authorization form

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Authorization+Form
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to a Travel Form that is in Preliminary State and in Edit Mode
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Delete button at the bottom of the page
AND clicking Delete will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to delete the form from the system
**Title:** Warning

AND if they do not confirm the deletion, then they should be returned to the form and no action should be taken.

- Club Users are able to search and load prospect profiles that they have entered

 - BOC Users are able to search and load all player profiles within AMT
 - When a BOC User is viewing the profile of a player that has been checked in by other clubs, they will see a comprehensive check in history that covers check ins by all clubs
 - When a BOC User is viewing the profile of a player that has been checked in by other clubs, they will see a comprehensive Travel Authorization history that covers forms created by all clubs

title: Expand expense tracking to include more fields(Updated Travel form)
custom_steps:
As a BOC admin, I want the ability to track player expenses on a more granular level than I am currently able to.

AC
Addition of a checkbox to the Accompanying Parent/Guardian section. "The Player will be Accompanied by Parent/Guardian"
If this checkbox is checked the rest of the fields in that section will show, if it's not checked none of the fields will show
Remove the text "(if applicable)" from the Accompanying Parent/Guardian section header
The Travel Expenses section has been updated to accommodate more fields. The Parent/Guardian block would not show unless the checkbox we added above is checked.
These fields should be added to the expense tracking form for both the prospect and the accompanying parent/guardian:
Air Transportation (numeric)
Ground Transportation (numeric)
Hotel (numeric)
Other Expenses (Meals, etc.). (numeric)
A text box to enter details about the other expenses. (text)
As the individual boxes are filled out, total their amounts for their respective entity (one total for player, one total for guardian).
The numeric fields should have validation to ensure only numbers are entered.
On failure of this check, display an error message to the user "Please enter a numeric value for [field name]."
See new design for this form here:
https://app.zeplin.io/project/5ba14555c5656b02189b6f39/screen/5be20924d2521e3d0a644033

title: Perform matching against pro players who are released
custom_steps:
As an AMT user, I want to perform matching checks vs. professional players because they are still eligible to be checked into an academy even if they are no longer an International Amateur player.

AC
Implement matching of pro players per the business rules described below.
Matching UI/workflow should work the same way current matching works.
Business Rules
Players Who Have Previously Signed with an MLB Club
An International Tryout Player who has previously signed with an MLB Club, but is currently a free agent and eligible to sign may enter a Club Facility without restriction.
An International Tryout Player whose previous contract was voided, terminated or not approved shall not be considered to have previously signed with an MLB Club for purposes of this definition.
